content:
{"name": "SMILE", "alternate_name": "", "description": "A SMILE ID card must be presented to receive any SMILE services, including the Food Pantry, Thrift Store, and Emergency Services.
To obtain a SMILE card, you must register at the SMILE Thrift Store during its normal hours of operation:
Wednesdays, Thursdays, and Fridays: 10 am to 2 pm
Saturdays: 9 am to 12 noon

", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "10290 H G Trueman Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Lusby", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20657", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.3971143, "longitude": -76.4365595}, "phones": [{"number": "(410) 326-0009", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "14:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}]}
